mapper.insert: insert into td_member values(seq_td_mb_no.nextval, #{mbId}, #{mbEmail}, #{mbPw}, sysdate, 0, null, 0)
mapper.update: update td_member set mb_pw = #{mbPw} where mb_no = #{mbNo}
update td_member set mb_isleave = 1, mb_leavedate = sysdate where mb_no = #{mbNo}
update td_member set mb_auth = 1 where mb_no = #{mbNo}
mapper.select: select * from td_member where (mb_id = #{mbId} OR mb_email = #{mbEmail}) AND mb_pw = #{mbPw} AND mb_isleave = 0
select count(mb_id) from td_member where mb_id = #{mbId} AND mb_isleave = 0
select count(mb_email) from td_member where mb_email = #{mbEmail} AND mb_isleave = 0
